Class MobileActor

java.lang.Object
Actor
MobileActor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Gatherer, Thief
public abstract class MobileActor
extends Actor

This is MobileActor class for unimelb SWEN20003 2020s2 assignment 2

All of the subclasses are not stationary

Created on 9/18/2020
